generatedTitle: why do people want prenuptial agreement

extractFactDictList.question: How many reasons do people want prenuptial agreements?
extractFactDictList.sentence: One of the main reasons why people want prenuptial agreements is to protect their assets.

extractFactDictList.question: How many parties are typically divided in a divorce?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In the event of a divorce, the assets that were acquired during the marriage are typically divided between the two parties.

extractFactDictList.question: How many parties can a prenuptial agreement specify how their financial responsibilities will be divided?
extractFactDictList.sentence: Prenuptial agreements can specify how financial responsibilities will be divided between the two parties in the event of a divorce or separation.

extractFactDictList.question: Prenuptial agreements can provide benefits in the event of the death of how many parties?
extractFactDictList.sentence: In addition to protecting assets and establishing financial obligations, prenuptial agreements can also provide benefits in the event of the death of one of the parties.
